test-case.name: User is allowed to login with valid credentials

test-case.name: Welcome message is displayed to logged in user
test-case.title: Welcome message is displayed to logged in user

failure.message:
Text of welcome message is not as expected Expect $(`h2[class='headline-bold account-overview-head__title']`) to have text containing
Expected: "Hao" Received: "Hallo Ftest Ltest ,"
